price: Ɛna motenaa wͻn a wͻdii bͻne tiaa wͻn ara wͻn ho no atenaeε, wͻ aberε a yεdaa deε Yεde yεε wͻn no adi kyerεε mo, εna Yεyεε mfatoho pii nso de kyerεε mo?
arabic: وَسَكَنتُمۡ فِي مَسَٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُمۡ كَيۡفَ فَعَلۡنَا بِهِمۡ وَضَرَبۡنَا لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wasakantum fī masākini alladhīna ẓalamū anfusahum watabayyana lakum kayfa faʿalnā bihim waḍarabnā lakumu al-amthāla
